Comment: The starting position for this thematic tournament.  I used to like the Benoni when I was a teenager, and my admiration grew when I became aware that Tal was a major exponent, but my own experience with the opening is sorry...

Now that both players' kings are castled, we're both nearly fully developed, but both our queenside Bishops and Rooks are still at home and Black's B is blocked in by a knight.  White also seems to have more space, so appears to have the advantage at this stage.
